General.Name: Shanghai Baosteel Packaging
General.Description: Shanghai Baosteel Packaging Co., Ltd. engages in the production of metal packaging products in China and internationally. It provides two-piece cans, packaged color-printed iron products, and commissioned processed printed iron products to fast-moving consumer goods industry, such as food and beverages. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Shanghai, China. Shanghai Baosteel Packaging Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Baosteel Metal Co., Ltd.
